<title level="1" right="Deity " pfs="Standard">[Ravithra (The Mother of Nagas;  The Chalice-Bearer)](/Deities.aspx?ID=218)</title>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

<traits>
<trait label="LN" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
</traits>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Impossible Lands](/Sources.aspx?ID=146) pg. 318, [Pathfinder #161: Belly of the Black Whale](/Sources.aspx?ID=51) pg. 75</row>

The Mother of Nagas, the Karmic Pillar, and the Chalice-Bearer of the danavas, Ravithra was decapitated and brought low by treachery. She grants boons only to mortal champions who seek to topple the treacherous and to restore her to her rightful role.

<column gap="tiny">

**Category** [Other Gods](/DeityCategories.aspx?ID=2)

**Edicts** enforce karma's pitiless judgment, shame fools, kill traitors, pursue the Chalice of Amrit

**Anathema** make decisions erratically or randomly, provide aid to Vasaghati or her followers, engage in treachery

**Area of Concern**
judgment, karma, law, vengeance

**Follower Alignments**
LG, LN, N, LE

</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">
<image src="/images/Deities/Ravithra.png" />
</column>

</row>
<title level="2">Devotee Benefits</title>

<column gap="tiny">

**[Divine Ability](/Backgrounds.aspx?ID=132)**
Intelligence or Wisdom

**Divine Font** [Harm](/Spells.aspx?ID=146)

**Divine Skill** [Occultism](/Skills.aspx?ID=11)

**Favored Weapon** [jaws](/Weapons.aspx?ID=1) or [Light Mace](/Weapons.aspx?ID=5)

**Domains** [Fate](/Domains.aspx?ID=12), [Naga](/Domains.aspx?ID=58), [Sorrow](/Domains.aspx?ID=50), [Truth](/Domains.aspx?ID=32)

**[Alternate Domains](/Rules.aspx?ID=802)** [Ambition](/Domains.aspx?ID=1), [Soul](/Domains.aspx?ID=51)

**Cleric Spells**

- **1st**
[Charm](/Spells.aspx?ID=34)

- **2nd**
[Animal Form](/Spells.aspx?ID=10)
(snake only)

- **4th**
[Clairvoyance](/Spells.aspx?ID=40)

</column>
